title: Chicken En Cocette
directions: Season chicken and brown in butter on all sides. Remove chiecken and drain all but 2 Tbsp fat.
Add vegetables to casserole and saute until ready to brown. Add stock, rosemary and soy sauce and bring to boil.
Return chicken to pan breast side up. Cover and bake for 45 minutes. Uncover and continue to cook until skin is crisp and juices are clear. ABout 15 minutes.
Remove chicken and vegetables. Skim fat and bring sauce to boil to combine flavours. Season with salt and pepper as desired.
ingredients: 1 Tbsp fresh rosemary or 1 tsp dried
